website_summaries.verdict: Going on that next outdoor adventure does not need to wait because the Explorer Ridge Plus GTX is able to deliver comfort immediately. Its slightly expensive price tag matches its satisfactory performance. Despite the recognized positive points, its easily frayed sole caused some disappointments. On the whole—even with the mentioned downside—the Berghaus Explorer Ridge Plus GTX remains to be a good companion on the trails.
pros: The majority stated that breaking in the Explorer Ridge Plus GTX wasn’t necessary
The light build of the boot received appreciation from hordes of hikers
According to a lot of wearers, the comfort delivered by the Berghaus Explorer Ridge Plus GTX was satisfying
It fits like a glove, as exclaimed by numerous pleased owners
A couple of gear experts loved how well the boot gripped on various trails
The Explorer Ridge Plus GTX from Berghaus was a bit pricey yet worth it, based on plenty of user reviews
Several day hikers mentioned that their foot remained dry even after wet encounters
cons: A couple of wearers noticed that the sole wore easily after a few hikes

customer_reviews.title: Bad Bad Bad !!!
customer_reviews.text: 3rd replacement pair due to water leaking in, and splitting where the leather joins the sole. Amazon replaced every time however when the 12 months was is up from the original purchase they refuse to replace the replacements, even though the replacements only last 6 months. I will not be buying Berghaus again.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Collins

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: So far these boots have got me around two trips to South America and the 3 Peaks Challenge. - Goretex waterproofing is excellent (great for wading through shallow streams) - Super comfortable and also warm (feet are nice and cosy inside a pair of walking socks and these) - Style is really nice and I’m happy to wear them outside of hiking times I give them a good clean and wax after use and they look good as new each time. Previous boots have started to fall apart but these are clearly very well made. Definitely worth splashing out a little more for a pair of these. Would buy again but it looks like I won’t need to!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: As Waterproof as Socks
customer_reviews.text: Light and fairly comfortable, but not at all waterproof after only six months / 700 miles of moderate use. I was caught in a heavy shower for ten minutes today and the boots leaked terribly within a couple of minutes. I'll choose another boot next time. My last two pairs of boots (original Explorer Ridge GTX) lasted longer over tougher terrain, were more waterproof and were in hindsight a little more comfortable too. Unfortunately the original ERGTX is as rare as hen's teeth nowadays. Maybe it's time to go back to Hillmasters.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wallace

customer_reviews.title: that would be cool, Berghaus
customer_reviews.text: sound pair of boots, reasonably waterproof when dashing across a stream. with a decent pair of gaiters & waterproofed boots (wax) wet grass holds no fears. First worn at last T in The Park, total mud-fest but my feet were none the wiser warm & dry in their new homes, Holmes. Last summer though the stitching across each tongue has failed, at the leather patch atop the tongue. can't see either being mended due to raggedy nature of stitching area. not unless somebody from Berghaus is listening & they can offer a solution or even, a new pair of boots. that would be cool, Berghaus. Well cool!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Terry

customer_reviews.title: A high quality narrow fitting boot.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality goid value boot. The fitting is for a narrow foot in my opinion. My usual fitting of 7.5 mens was slightly too narrow for my feet. Some will find this an andvantage of course. Its unfortunate that fitting width is not readily available from all manufacturers. That said, I have found them most suitable and have already walked several tens of km in them without any damage. The comfort actually increases when they are warmed up after a frew km. I think I would try size 8 next time and wear thicker socks. But I am satisfied with my buy and they have retained both strenght and looks so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Sole has begun to crack
customer_reviews.text: I use these boots for hydrology fieldwork in South America and the Caribbean. The boot is comfortable and at present still waterproof. Nevertheless, with less than 100 hours of use, the sole has started to crack where it joins the boot. Disappointing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair of these.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a previous pair I own that the soles have worn through. I can't believe after 5 years they are still waterproof. Did loads of trying on of different brand hoping to get a cheaper boot of the same quality but in the end Ia just decided to order these again. Not the cheapest but absolutely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mcglincheys

customer_reviews.title: their old boots were better. Why change a pertfectly good shoe design for ...
customer_reviews.text: Expected more from Berghaus, their old boots were better. Why change a pertfectly good shoe design for this worse one? Waterproofing less good and ugly to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot. Soft underfoot and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot. Soft underfoot and lightweight. Narrow style too, so I don't feel like I'm clunking along. I'm very happy with these. And Amazon exchanged a size. Thank you. I'm usually sizes 11 but I ended up with size 10 of these. So watch out guys for free exchanges, you might need it.
customer_reviews.author: deepforest

customer_reviews.title: Made my ankle bleed.
customer_reviews.text: On my first 10 mile walk with theses boots they felt very comfortable, if a little tight. On my second walk the outside ankle on left foot bleed. I don't know if some of the padding has moved or the heal has settled, but they are now unwearable.
customer_reviews.author: G. Savage

customer_reviews.title: 00 a pair not good enough. Berhhaus is no better than cheap brands ...
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair of of berghaus boots that have either let in water or fallen apart in less then two years and @ over a £100.00 a pair not good enough . Berhhaus is no better than cheap brands any more.
customer_reviews.author: bookman

customer_reviews.title: great boot
customer_reviews.text: I bought explorer ridge plus boots again based on my last pair. These are a great boot and comfortable to wear straight out of the box, waterproof and durable, will buy again once these ones have worn out.
customer_reviews.author: clarkie

customer_reviews.title: Look good not yet tested
customer_reviews.text: Not yet walked in these boots. Loved the previous model had 3 pairs over 10 years. These have less joins in leather so hopefully durable. Not sure yet how sole will perform. Previous version had vicram.
customer_reviews.author: ceegee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boots but sizes need sorting!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these boots in a 12 even though i am an 11 shoe size, as i know boots of most makes come up small these days, they wouldn't want to be any smaller! This is strange as my size 11 Berghaus boots which i have had for 9 years fit exactly the same as these. Nice comfy boots though i haven't worn them much yet.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Hughesdon

customer_reviews.title: Good for casual hikers, durable but heavy
customer_reviews.text: They are good boots, very comfy but for me it came up a bit big, it also feels a little clunky and heavy for a hiking boot, for a short hike they are great and durable but for something longer it would be a problem, I'm using them for work instead as they are comfy and very water proof. The lace system slowly becomes lose over time and is hard to tie up tight I find. I'm planning a 212 mile hike this year and will be getting something better and lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T. Arnold Jones

customer_reviews.title: great price for favourite boots
customer_reviews.text: hubby's favourite boots, very smart and very durable, they last a long time despite the many miles walked every day
customer_reviews.author: L. C. Trees

customer_reviews.title: leaking
customer_reviews.text: had these boots 19 month but had very little wear, only used for walking dog in local park(I am 75) right boot is now leaking badly but I cannot see any splits or anywhere the water is getting in but insole is soaked. The boots are polished regularly ??
customer_reviews.author: Charles Swann

customer_reviews.title: Good gear
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of boots. Good support and waterproof. Good for daily dog walking and hill walking. Simply cannot fault for the price.Good allrounders. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: P.Gill

customer_reviews.title: He said and I quote "He had never had such a comfortable boot on his foot
customer_reviews.text: They were actually bought as a gift for my son as a replacement for a pair of the same he had previously. He said and I quote "He had never had such a comfortable boot on his foot." and he does walk some miles in them.
customer_reviews.author: Linny

customer_reviews.title: Good quality walking boots.
customer_reviews.text: Brought to replace a pair of the same make. Comfortable to wear from the beginning. Good price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: annie m

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these so far
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these so far. I have been out in some pretty soggy grass recently and there is no sign of leakage.
customer_reviews.author: PHB27

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, nice and light
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, nice and light, good grip, fully waterproof. Can easily hike for over 10 miles, and feet feel fresh as a daisy
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: these boots are excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Only one thing to say, these boots are excellent !
customer_reviews.author: E Jones

customer_reviews.title: Quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product. Sturdy and very comfy. Just need to do some walking in them. Pleased with the quality and should do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Colin T. Fleetham

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots.
customer_reviews.text: I walk over 1000 miles a year and have tried several boots. This is my second pair or these... perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof comfy cosy warm boots. Perfect for walking the dogs through wet grass and on the beach. Come with a lifetime guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband as he goes through cheaper brands in a few months. He's loving these so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable, keep my feet warm and dry in even ...
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable, keep my feet warm and dry in even the worst weather and mud. Great grip, fantastic for walking.
customer_reviews.author: sky_walker

customer_reviews.title: Bought them for the father in law. He set ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for the father in law. He set off for a 25 klm hike the day he got home. Loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Best boots
customer_reviews.text: My third pair of Burghaus boots in 20 years. Never fail.
customer_reviews.author: Seamouse 1000

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable boot but the sole has worn down very fast ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable boot but the sole has worn down very fast despite my only moderate use on soft surfaces. Very expensive considering the limited life.
customer_reviews.author: max vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Top quality footwear, only issue I have a little narrow. I should of gone a size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great pair of boots and as alway value for money
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable boots wider And roomier than ladies fitting and higher ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable boots wider And roomier than ladies fitting and higher in the back fully waterproof and lifetime guarantee
customer_reviews.author: manxgal

customer_reviews.title: New boots
customer_reviews.text: Look great and fit great feel great ..really comfy to wear straight away love them
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. E. Shaftoe

customer_reviews.title: We wear them dog walking and love them.
customer_reviews.text: We have had these boots before. We wear them dog walking and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. S

customer_reviews.title: Superb Boots
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots, very comfortable. My last pair lasted 30 years. I'm now 66 - so hopefully, these boots will see me out!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and supportive walking boots
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and supportive walking boots. I have walked several miles in them and no issues with my feet at all.
customer_reviews.author: Peachnet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work really well after several outings in the hills in very wet conditions came home with dry feet everytime
customer_reviews.author: Mr P Magyar

customer_reviews.title: Another good product from Berghaus
customer_reviews.text: Another good product from Berghaus. I am a 'normal' size11 and had Berghaus before so I knew that their 11 would be fine for me. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Alan W.

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise seemed good.
customer_reviews.text: To tight around the toes for my foot type. Returned and made shop purchase where I could try them on. Otherwise seemed good.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were my third pair of berghaus boots and were comfy from the off.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately when it rained recently one of the boots leaked and I was forced to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boots - really pleased with them. Comfortable and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Urquhart

customer_reviews.title: Berghaus Boots Yes
customer_reviews.text: Good fit good quality arrived on time happy with service
customer_reviews.author: john ryles

customer_reviews.title: Great product, hope they last as long as my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, hope they last as long as my old pair, same one did around 4yrs and approx 4500 mls
customer_reviews.author: Boeingbbj2

customer_reviews.title: Expected high quality and comfort levels
customer_reviews.text: I have used a number of quality boot brands, both leather and non-leather. Berghaus are a brand I often come back to. These fit perfectly and are comfortable in the two walks I have done with them so far. I will take them to New Zealand for an extended hiking holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Smith

customer_reviews.title: These very well made boots do not (unfortunately) come in ...
customer_reviews.text: These very well made boots do not (unfortunately) come in width fittings and so reluctantly I had to return these
customer_reviews.author: Happy buyer

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable despite very little 'wearing in'
customer_reviews.text: I find these very suitable for dog-walking in wet and muddy conditions. They are very comfortable despite very little 'wearing in', and have kept my feet dry and warm despite very wet conditions; however, it's only fair to add that I've only worn them for a maximum of 1 hour at a time. My one criticism is that the tab on the heel is too small to be of much help in yanking the boots off at the end of a walk.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lawson Holmes

customer_reviews.title: The seem perfect, high quality
customer_reviews.text: Just got the shoes and very excited!! The seem perfect, high quality, it's the second day I've been wearing them around the house to get used to them and up to now they've been incredibly comfortable from the box (remains to be seen how they do under hiking conditions). I normally wear 45-46 shoes, I got an 11 (45.5) and they are quite big, but with two pairs of socks they are perfect, so in the end this was the best size for me.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Wore them straight away whilst walking our dog and they are very comfortable. This is the very first review I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought size 9 but this was too small. Used Amazon return/exchange for size 9.5. This size exactly what I needed. Wore them straight away whilst walking our dog and they are very comfortable. This is the very first review I have completed on any product because I do not particularly trust some of the write-ups. However, there is a first time for everything. Buy and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: snowy

customer_reviews.title: Parting company
customer_reviews.text: I have had this style and make of boot for moderate walking for a few years now.......sorry to say this time the sole has started to come away from the uppers.......not happy.
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: ... boots I have bought in the past 7years and worst for fit
customer_reviews.text: Most expensive boots I have bought in the past 7years and worst for fit ,water repellant and threading up won't purchase Berghaus again
customer_reviews.author: andrew boitz

customer_reviews.title: Repeat purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. They are light and comfortable and waterproof. Disappointing only that my last pair lasted just 15 months before sole wore out. I persevere with product because they are otherwise excellent but sole should be more resilient. They do not get heavy use - mixed terrain, about 3-4 miles daily.
customer_reviews.author: J C.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I have brought Berghaus fabric walking boots before and was always pleased with them. Put on the bots and walked my dogs for a 4 mile walk, in wet muddy conditions by the river bank. The boots were fantastic, kept my feet warm and dry. No blisters or evidence of walking 4 miles in new boots. These boots 'ARE' made for walking. Would recommend to my walking friends.
customer_reviews.author: gilliebigears

customer_reviews.title: Buy at Least a size over your normal boot size.
customer_reviews.text: A good looking boot but boy it's not only a size to small but you also have to have thin feet as they are very tight, it could do with pull up tabs on the back of the boots to help putting them on. Very disappointed overall.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic ordered them Saturday night arrived Sunday afternoon with no extra cost well expressed will be ordering again
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell heaven or hell.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable compared with my older beloved walkers. It all takes time. Too new to judge fairly.Ask me in a year or two? Design wise compared with my others "not so good!"... The eyes nearest the "toe end" could have been a bit lower, there apears to be a lot of "space between eyes and toe cap?..They would look better in "my opinion" a bit lower down! I am now finding them "slightly" slippery on certain terain.. But "very" comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Davidovitch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, although I wish it were made in Europe and not China.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. F. G. Fairfield

product_meta.title: Berghaus Men's Explorer Ridge Plus GTX Boot
product_meta.description: The Berghaus Explorer Ridge Plus boots use the best technology and performance materials available to help you enjoy long hikes on the fells. Combining GORE-TEX waterproof protection with Pittards leather from a UK tannery, these boots deliver comfort, grip and traction from your first stride onwards. The Explorer Ridge Plus boots are better than ever for are packed with features and technology. The leather upper is combined with an EVA midsole and OrthoLite foot bed for great cushioning and anti-odour properties. A Berghaus engineered TPU PLANTAR PLATE protects and secures each foot while the OPTI-STUD outsole delivers outstanding grip on all surfaces. Recommended by the Duke of Edinburgh's Award.
feature_bullets: Enhanced Holding System and foam positioning
OrthoLite footbed for anti-odour underfoot cushioning
EVA midsole provides shock absorption and cushioning
